**The World's Billionaires List**

Forbes magazine releases a yearly list of the world's richest people, called "The World's Billionaires." To be on the list, someone must have a net worth of at least $1 billion. The list started in 1987. It estimates each person's wealth in U.S. dollars based on their assets and debts.

In recent years, Jeff Bezos (Amazon) and Elon Musk (Tesla) have topped the list. In 2023, Bernard Arnault from France became the richest person, making him the first French person to hold this spot.
title: The World's Billionaires
